text:
Knowcross to participate in Hotel Management Singapore Summit Published on : Friday, October 23, 2015
Hotel management software company Knowcross are set to take part in the Hotel Management Singapore Summit at the Sands Expo and Convention Centre, Marina Bay Sands, Singapore on 22 October 2015.
The leading Singapore conference directly addresses all operational and management challenges facing hoteliers. It provides a platform for hotel executives to discuss strategies and debate on essential topics including brand equity, cash-flow management, cost control, innovation, staff retention and development. Industry leaders from around the world will share their best practices and recommendations with their peers.
Amongst the speakers is Knowcross CEO, Nikhil Nath, who will be a panellist on the talk “Reinvestigating Operating Processes and Service Offerings to Boost Productivity” taking place at 10:10am in the Cassia Ballroom. During the discussion, Nikhil will discuss the ways in which technology can streamline processes and increase productivity in a hotel, therefore enhancing the guest experience. Joining Nikhil on the panel will be Sara Kearney, Senior VP of Operations Asia Pacific, Hyatt Hotels & Resorts; Ian Wilson, SVP Hotels Operations, Marina Bay Sands; Bart Buiring, SVP Operations Asia Pacific, Marriott International and Soo Hin Yeoh, VP Finance of Kempinski Hotels, China.
Running alongside the Hotel Management Summit will be the Hotel Technology Conference, Asia’s only dedicated platform for hotel CIOs, CTOs, Information Officers and E-commerce Directors to discuss how existing and emerging technologies can support and help grow new revenue sources, improve operational efficiency and enhance customer service standards. During the conference, Knowcross will be exhibiting their product range with full demonstrations at table no. 20 in the Cassia Ballroom, situated on the third floor of the Sands Expo and Convention Centre.
Knowcross software is used by leading hotel brands across the world including Kempinski, Rosewood, Corinthia, Oberoi, Radisson, Sixty Hotels, Holiday Inn, DoubleTree by Hilton and Taj. The cloud-based software can be interfaced to existing hotel property management systems including Opera, Fidelio, Itesso and Protel. All of Knowcross’ mobile apps are available for the Apple iOS and Android platforms.
